name: Pageviews to session ratio evolution
description: For each device there should be significantly more pageviews than sessions. If the ratio of pageviews to sessions changes significantly for any device, it could indicate errors with measurement or access for the certain device. To evaluate significance of changes, anomaly detection framework is used. A step-by-step guide for anomaly detection in Waaila can be found in the documentation.

constants.name: anomalyDetectionConfig
constants.description: Settings of the anomaly detection analysis

blocks.description: Analyze presence of anomalies in session to user ratio by device category
blocks.failMessage: There was an anomaly in the ${valueColumnName}
